::DarkMouse::

She stayed perfectly still for a few more moments.  She knew she was 
in danger, but from who and what and for what reasons, she didn't 
know.

She needed help.  But who would help her? None that she knew of.  She 
had to do something.  She looked at her pet.  "Well, we have a 
choice. We can stand our ground and get slagged, or get help."
But from whom would that help come from.  She slowly crawled out of 
the log.  She held her pet in her mouth and sniffed the air.  She 
couldn't smell anything that resembled Pred.  She started out again.

She scurried along the forest floor.  The sun was getting low in the 
sky, the air was heavy and she was running out of ideas.
She desided to start using her mouse skills. She followed her nose.  
She picked up the scent of something that struck a cord in her memory.
It was the scent of a maxiaml.  She knew that preds and Maximals were 
enemies, but she was willing to make an exception.  She just hoped 
that they would.  She walked along following her nose.
